reviews.review_msg: I've taken 3 courses with Coleman and she is truly an incredible prof! Not only do I feel like I learned a lot, but I feel like I am leaving the class a better person. She is so compassionate if anything comes up for you during the semester and truly cares about every one of her students. Get ready to be inspired in every single lecture!

Coleman is an incredible prof, if you do the readings, show up to class, participate, and engage with assignments you will get an a. Sounds like a lot of work, but Coleman makes learning exciting so it doesn't feel like it. I have taken four classes with her and all of them are similar in that the reading load is heavy, but all good reads!
Tiffany is a great professor. She really cares about students and want to make school fun and interesting. We had many field trips and It was nice not always being in a classroom. It was awesome!

Natasha is super blunt, provides very few instructions for her assignments and then degrades her students for not doing well, and shows little to no respect to her students. If you have an emergency and need to miss class don't bother justifying it, she won't waive participation. I emailed her regarding a family emergency and she left me on read.
